sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { Box, Typography, Container, Grid } from '@mui/material'; import './style.css'; const AboutSection = () => { return ( About Me {/* Left Side: Bio Text */} I am a high-performance developer dedicated to bridging the gap between complex technical challenges and intuitive digital interfaces. With over 5 years of experience, my expertise extends beyond standard web architecture into high-stakes, real-world problem solving—most notably engineering precision software to solve critical laboratory bottlenecks. I don’t just write code; I build robust digital systems that translate intricate data into seamless, human-centric experiences. {/* Right Side: Stats sidebar */} Experience 5+ years in web development Projects 20+ completed projects Efficiency 20% more efficient project delivery ); }; export default AboutSection;
